'''Khvarena Mayflies''' are an exploration mechanic found in [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. They consist of a tree stump with a [[chest]] on it and small [[Khvarena]] creatures floating around. Investigating one of them causes the three mayflies to fly off and float around in the vicinity while a timer activates. Upon running to the mayflies and catching them all within a limit, the chest will unlock. After collecting the chest, the time challenge of catching mayflies is still available, though without a reward.
